description: ACM V10 Dashboard - Shows: (1) Health & Quality, (2) Operating Regimes (normal modes), (3) Anomaly Episodes (abnormal events - ACM_Anomaly_Events table), (4) Episode Diagnostics (forensics - ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics table). Regimes = continuous timeline (9,087 records). Episodes = sparse anomalies (76 records).

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 1 ROUND(HealthIndex, 1) AS value, 'Health Score' AS metric FROM ACM_HealthTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
SELECT ROUND(MAX(LatestAbsZ), 2) AS value, 'Anomaly Severity' AS metric FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT RegimeLabel) AS value, 'Operating Regimes' AS metric FROM ACM_RegimeTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(TotalEpisodes), 0) AS value, 'Episodes Detected' AS metric FROM ACM_EpisodeMetrics WHERE EquipID = $equipment

panels.title: SECTION 1: HEALTH & DATA QUALITY (Smoothed Health Score with Quality Tracking)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  HealthIndex AS value,
  'Health Score' AS metric
FROM
  ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
  AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY
  Timestamp
SELECT Timestamp AS time, OMR_Z AS value, 'OMR Score' AS metric FROM ACM_OMRTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    HealthIndex AS value,
    'Smoothed Health' AS metric
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
UNION ALL
SELECT 
    Timestamp AS time,
    RawHealthIndex AS value,
    'Raw Health (Unsmoothed)' AS metric
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
  AND RawHealthIndex IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY time ASC

SELECT 
    QualityFlag,
    COUNT(*) AS Count
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY QualityFlag
ORDER BY Count DESC

WITH HealthChanges AS (
    SELECT 
        Timestamp,
        HealthIndex,
        RawHealthIndex,
        LAG(HealthIndex) OVER (ORDER BY Timestamp) AS PrevHealth,
        ABS(HealthIndex - LAG(HealthIndex) OVER (ORDER BY Timestamp)) AS HealthChange,
        FusedZ,
        QualityFlag
    FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
    WHERE EquipID = $equipment
      AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
)
SELECT TOP 20
    FORMAT(Timestamp, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS 'Time',
    ROUND(PrevHealth, 1) AS 'Previous Health',
    ROUND(HealthIndex, 1) AS 'Current Health',
    ROUND(HealthChange, 1) AS 'Change (abs)',
    ROUND(FusedZ, 2) AS 'FusedZ',
    QualityFlag AS 'Quality'
FROM HealthChanges
WHERE HealthChange > 10.0
ORDER BY HealthChange DESC

SELECT
DATEADD(HOUR, DATEDIFF(HOUR, 0, StartTime), 0) AS time,
COUNT(*) AS value,
'Events' AS metric
FROM
ACM_Anomaly_Events
WHERE
EquipID = $equipment
AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
DATEADD(HOUR, DATEDIFF(HOUR, 0, StartTime), 0)
ORDER BY
time ASC

panels.title: SECTION 2: OPERATING REGIMES - Normal Modes (NOT Anomalies - From ACM_RegimeTimeline)

targets.rawSql:
WITH RegimeSummary AS (
  SELECT
    CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR)) AS RegimeName,
    RegimeLabel,
    COUNT(*) AS RecordCount,
    CAST(
      COUNT(*) * 100.0 / (
        SELECT
          COUNT(*)
        FROM
          ACM_RegimeTimeline
        WHERE
          EquipID = $equipment
      ) AS DECIMAL(5, 2)
    ) AS Percentage
  FROM
    ACM_RegimeTimeline
  WHERE
    EquipID = $equipment
  GROUP BY
    RegimeLabel
)
SELECT
  RegimeName,
  Percentage
FROM
  RegimeSummary
ORDER BY
  Percentage DESC

panels.description: Shows operating regime transitions over time. Panel displays only when multiple regimes are detected in the selected time range. If equipment operates in a single stable regime, this panel will be empty.

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Timestamp AS time,
  CONCAT('Regime ', CAST(RegimeLabel AS VARCHAR)) AS metric,
  1 AS value
FROM
  ACM_RegimeTimeline
WHERE
  EquipID = $equipment
  AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
  AND $__timeTo()
  AND EXISTS (
    SELECT
      1
    FROM
      (
        SELECT
          COUNT(DISTINCT RegimeLabel) AS regime_count
        FROM
          ACM_RegimeTimeline
        WHERE
          EquipID = $equipment
          AND Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
          AND $__timeTo()
      ) AS rc
    WHERE
      rc.regime_count > 1
  )
ORDER BY
  Timestamp,
  RegimeLabel

panels.title: Regime Timeline - Transitions
SECTION 3: ANOMALY EPISODES - Abnormal Events (When Things Go Wrong - ACM_Anomaly_Events)

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 15 SensorName, ROUND(LatestAbsZ, 2) AS AnomalySeverity, AboveAlertCount AS AlertCount, FORMAT(MaxTimestamp, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS PeakTime FROM ACM_SensorHotspots WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC

panels.title: Top Anomalous Sensors - Ranked by Severity

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 15 DetectorType AS SensorName, ROUND(AVG(ContributionPct), 2) AS AvgContribution, ROUND(MAX(ContributionPct), 2) AS MaxContribution, COUNT(*) AS Occurrences FROM ACM_ContributionTimeline WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND ContributionPct > 0 GROUP BY DetectorType ORDER BY AvgContribution DESC

panels.title: Top OMR Contributing Features - Ranked by Avg Impact

targets.rawSql:
WITH TopSensors AS (
  SELECT TOP 5 SensorName
  FROM ACM_SensorHotspots
  WHERE EquipID = $equipment
  ORDER BY LatestAbsZ DESC
)
SELECT
  sn.Timestamp AS time,
  sn.SensorName AS metric,
  ROUND(sn.ZScore, 2) AS value
FROM ACM_SensorNormalized_TS sn
INNER JOIN TopSensors ts ON sn.SensorName = ts.SensorName
WHERE sn.EquipID = $equipment
  AND sn.Timestamp BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()
ORDER BY sn.Timestamp ASC

SELECT SUM(TotalEpisodes) AS 'Episodes', ROUND(AVG(AvgDurationHours), 2) AS 'Avg Duration', ROUND(MAX(MaxDurationHours), 2) AS 'Max Duration', ROUND(AVG(RatePerDay), 2) AS 'Episodes/Day' FROM ACM_EpisodeMetrics WHERE EquipID = $equipment

panels.title: Episode Statistics (76 Episodes Total - Summary from ACM_EpisodeMetrics)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
DATEADD(HOUR, DATEDIFF(HOUR, 0, StartTime), 0) AS time,
COUNT(*) AS value,
'Events' AS metric
FROM
ACM_Anomaly_Events
WHERE
EquipID = $equipment
AND StartTime BETWEEN $__timeFrom()
AND $__timeTo()
GROUP BY
DATEADD(HOUR, DATEDIFF(HOUR, 0, StartTime), 0)
ORDER BY
time ASC

panels.title: Anomaly Events Timeline - 76 Episodes Shown as Bars (Each bar = 1 episode from ACM_Anomaly_Events)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT TOP 20
  ed.episode_id AS 'Episode ID',
  FORMAT(ed.peak_timestamp, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm') AS 'Time',
  ed.severity AS 'Severity',
  ROUND(ed.peak_z, 2) AS 'Peak Z',
  ROUND(ed.duration_h, 1) AS 'Duration (h)',
  ed.dominant_sensor AS 'Dominant Sensor',
  COALESCE(r.RegimeLabel, 'Unknown') AS 'Regime',
  FORMAT(ae.StartTime, 'HH:mm') + ' - ' + FORMAT(ae.EndTime, 'HH:mm') AS 'Episode Window'
FROM ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics ed
LEFT JOIN ACM_RegimeTimeline r 
  ON ed.peak_timestamp = r.Timestamp AND ed.EquipID = r.EquipID
LEFT JOIN ACM_Anomaly_Events ae
  ON ed.EquipID = ae.EquipID 
  AND ed.peak_timestamp >= ae.StartTime 
  AND ed.peak_timestamp <= ae.EndTime
WHERE ed.EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY ed.peak_timestamp DESC

panels.title: SECTION 4: Episode Diagnostics - Detailed Forensics (ACM_EpisodeDiagnostics + Regime Context)

targets.rawSql: SELECT Timestamp AS time, DriftValue AS value, 'Drift Score' AS metric FROM ACM_DriftSeries WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC OFFSET 0 ROWS FETCH NEXT 500 ROWS ONLY

panels.title: Model Drift Detection - Concept Drift Evolution

targets.rawSql: WITH latest_run AS (SELECT TOP 1 RunID FROM ACM_DataQuality WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY COALESCE(score_max_ts, train_max_ts) DESC) SELECT TOP 50 sensor AS 'SensorName', COALESCE(score_null_pct, train_null_pct, 0) AS 'MissingPct', score_longest_gap AS 'LongestGap', score_flatline_span AS 'FlatlineSpan', sampling_secs AS 'SamplingSeconds', CheckResult AS 'Status' FROM ACM_DataQuality dq WHERE dq.EquipID = $equipment AND dq.RunID = (SELECT RunID FROM latest_run) ORDER BY MissingPct DESC, LongestGap DESC

SELECT Detector, ROUND(AVG(Weight), 4) AS 'Fusion Weight', ROUND(AVG(MeanZ), 2) AS 'Mean Z', ROUND(MAX(MaxZ), 2) AS 'Max Z' FROM ACM_FusionQualityReport WHERE EquipID = $equipment GROUP BY Detector ORDER BY AVG(Weight) DESC

-- Maintenance recommendations based on current health and active defects
-- Note: RUL forecasting disabled - see docs/FORECASTING_FUTURE_WORK.md
SELECT
  TOP 1
  (
    SELECT TOP 1 ROUND(HealthIndex, 1)
    FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
    WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
  ) AS 'Current Health',
  (
    SELECT TOP 1 HealthZone
    FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
    WHERE EquipID = $equipment
    ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
  ) AS 'Health Zone',
  (
    SELECT COUNT(*)
    FROM ACM_SensorDefects sd
    INNER JOIN ACM_Runs r ON sd.RunID = r.RunID
    WHERE sd.EquipID = $equipment
      AND sd.ActiveDefect = 1
      AND r.StartedAt >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, GETDATE())
  ) AS 'Active Defects (7d)',
  (
    SELECT TOP 1 sd.TagName
    FROM ACM_SensorDefects sd
    INNER JOIN ACM_Runs r ON sd.RunID = r.RunID
    WHERE sd.EquipID = $equipment
      AND sd.ActiveDefect = 1
      AND r.StartedAt >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, GETDATE())
    ORDER BY sd.CurrentZ DESC
  ) AS 'Top Defect Sensor',
  (
    SELECT TOP 1 ROUND(sd.CurrentZ, 1)
    FROM ACM_SensorDefects sd
    INNER JOIN ACM_Runs r ON sd.RunID = r.RunID
    WHERE sd.EquipID = $equipment
      AND sd.ActiveDefect = 1
      AND r.StartedAt >= DATEADD(DAY, -7, GETDATE())
    ORDER BY sd.CurrentZ DESC
  ) AS 'Max Z-Score',
  CASE
    WHEN (
      SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
      WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
    ) < 30 THEN 'CRITICAL - Immediate Inspection'
    WHEN (
      SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
      WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
    ) < 50 THEN 'HIGH - Schedule Maintenance'
    WHEN (
      SELECT TOP 1 HealthIndex FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
      WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY Timestamp DESC
    ) < 70 THEN 'MEDIUM - Monitor Closely'
    ELSE 'LOW - Normal Operation'
  END AS 'Priority',
  'Anomaly Detection' AS 'Recommended By'
FROM ACM_HealthTimeline
WHERE EquipID = $equipment
ORDER BY Timestamp DESC;

panels.description: Note: Shows cumulative defect statistics across all runs. For time-filtered defects, see Episode Diagnostics panel.

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 20 DetectorType AS 'Detector', Severity, ViolationCount AS 'Violations', ROUND(ViolationPct, 1) AS 'Violation %', ROUND(MaxZ, 2) AS 'Peak Z', ROUND(AvgZ, 2) AS 'Avg Z', ROUND(CurrentZ, 2) AS 'Current Z', CASE WHEN ActiveDefect = 1 THEN 'Active' ELSE 'Historical' END AS 'Status' FROM ACM_SensorDefects WHERE EquipID = $equipment ORDER BY ViolationPct DESC

panels.title: Defect Analysis - Sensor Violations by Detector

panels.description: Real-time ACM run logs showing errors, warnings, and info messages. Filtered by equipment and time range.

targets.rawSql: SELECT TOP 100 LoggedAt AS 'Timestamp', Level, Message FROM ACM_RunLogs WHERE EquipID = $equipment AND LoggedAt BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() ORDER BY LoggedAt DESC

panels.title: Run Logs - Latest Events (Top 100 in Time Range)

list.definition: SELECT CAST(EquipID AS VARCHAR) AS __value, COALESCE(EquipName, CONCAT('Equipment-', CAST(EquipID AS VARCHAR))) AS __text FROM Equipment ORDER BY EquipName
list.label: Equipment
list.name: equipment
list.query: SELECT CAST(EquipID AS VARCHAR) AS __value, COALESCE(EquipName, CONCAT('Equipment-', CAST(EquipID AS VARCHAR))) AS __text FROM Equipment ORDER BY EquipName

title: Asset Health Dashboard v10 - Comprehensive System Overview with Predictive Analytics
